name: You will run out of disk space soon
description: Detects short-term capacity problems of a disk and fires when the disk is likely to run out of capacity within the next hour. The detector is not firing when the disk freed up a considerable amount of space (>=100MB) in the recent past, or when the remaining disk space is more than 20% of the total capacity. However, it will fire when the disk space would fill up within the next hour based on the current trend. This trend is computed based on a linear regression model fitted on the data points of the current sliding window.
